subject: 3 Ways to Fix Discovery Before Peak Season

Hey Atto,

Our upcoming webinar is almost here—and it’s full of strategies you can start using immediately to improve product discovery and drive more revenue.

Why attend?

?️ Shoppers are more impatient than ever.

⚙️ Tech stacks are more complex than ever.

? And the pressure to deliver results? Higher than ever.

Join us to learn how top brands are solving discovery with personalisation, automation, and smarter onsite experiences.

Webinar Details:

? Wednesday, September 10th

? 11:00 AM AEST | Live with Alex Ross & Jacinda Delaney

What you’ll walk away with:

- Tactics to surface high-intent products faster
- Tips for personalising at scale—without overcomplicating
- A blueprint to stop bounce and abandonment cold

? Fun Fact: Shoppers who discover the right products fast are 3x more likely to convert.



?️ Secure Your Spot Now
